Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.title: Iulian-Dragomirescu/website-scraper-to-excel: A lightweight, open-source web scraper built with Node.js and Cheerio that extracts website prices and saves it in Excel format.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
